body:
Hi I want to bake to LADYBUG Sunpath diagram as an object in rhino. When set the Boolean toggle to true I get an error stating that "Solution exception:Local variable 'angleCrvsOnly' referenced before assignment.". Any has any idea why I get this error?

Thank you in advance
topic: bake ladybug sun path into rhino

replies.body:
Hi Mahsa,



it is a small bug. We will fix it as soon as possible, in the meantime try this file.

Thanks



- Antonello
